title: RIP Monty Oum
body:
So, I don't know if anyone has done a thread today on this, but I just learned about it less than an hour ago.

For those of you who don't know, Monty Oum is the animator for Red vs Blue and one of the creators of RWBY.

He was in critical condition up until today where he died.
He apparently died from a severe allergic reaction to whatever was used on him during a medical procedure.
I was wanted to say this so that anyone who is a fan of RvB or RWBY now knows.

RIP Monty, may you create masterpieces wherever you go from here.
